Cadence

Welcome to Cadence

Lightweight Wargaming Rules for any Setting

Cadence is a tabletop miniature Wargaming System with a flexible ruleset that allows games to be played in a huge variety of styles and settings. Cadence is a simple system, easy to learn, but with enough depth to keep games interesting. The Core Rules provide a foundation that game modules expand upon to add their own elements, creating unqiue games that are quick to pick up and play.

Use any miniatures in your games

Cadence is a ruleset designed to be miniature agnostic: meaning there's no set rules about which miniatures you use. Modules and army lists are designed to be somewhat generic allowing you as much freedom as you want in your collection.

Explore Games in Cadence

Dark Millenium: Shadow War

Welcome to the Dark Millennium, immerse yourself in a rich grim universe where humans, aliens, and dark forces collide in deadly skirmishes. Engage in battles within cramped and perilous missions, putting your tactical skills to the test. The fate of humanity, for better or worse, hangs in the balance as you unleash your tactical might, for in the dark corners of the galaxy, only the strongest will prevail.

View the Shadow War module

Scraplands Showdown

In a post-apocalyptic future, "Scraplands Showdown" brings the mayhem of vehicle racing and combat to your tabletop. Build a team of unique vehicles, equip them with armor, weapons, and upgrades, and dive into a quick and exciting game. Race against rivals on treacherous tracks, dodging fire and unleashing devastating attacks. It's a compact, action-packed experience where survival is the only prize. Dominate the Scraplands and claim victory in this high-speed battle for supremacy!

View the Scraplands Showdown module
